SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tbl_article_comment (article_id, comment_id, create_by, is_effective) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isEffective,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select id, article_id, comment_id, create_by, is_effective from tbl_article_comment
